verses.name: Leviticus 13:27
verses.text: And the priest shall look upon him the seventh day: and if it be spread much abroad in the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is the plague of leprosy.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:28
verses.text: And if the bright spot stay in his place, and spread not in the skin, but it be somewhat dark; it is a rising of the burning, and the priest shall pronounce him clean: for it is an inflammation of the burning.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:29
verses.text: If a man or woman have a plague upon the head or the beard;
